title: ThumbnailType
content:

name: ThumbnailType
type: enum
summary: ''
description: |
  Describes the type of user thumbnail that should be returned by
  GetUserThumbnailAsync.
codesamples: []
tags: []
deprecationmessage: ''
items:
  - name: HeadShot
    summary: |
      The returned thumbnail shows just the headshot (head and up) of the user's
      avatar.
    value: 0
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: AvatarBust
    summary: |
      The returned thumbnail shows the bust (chest up) of the user's avatar.
    value: 1
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: AvatarThumbnail
    summary: |
      The returned thumbnail shows the entire body of the user's avatar.
    value: 2
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
